Module MC02

Class CashBox

java.lang.Object
CashBox
public class CashBox extends Object
Represents a cash box used in a vending machine to handle payments and change.

  • Method Details

    • isItemAvailable

      public boolean isItemAvailable(Item item)
      Checks if an item is available in the cash box (i.e., quantity > 0).
      Parameters:
      item - the Item object representing the item to check.
      Returns:
      true if the item is available, false otherwise.

    • addTotalAmount

      public void addTotalAmount(double amount)
      Adds an amount to the total amount paid for a transaction.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to add as a double value.

    • deductTotalAmount

      public void deductTotalAmount(double amount)
      Deducts an amount from the total amount paid for a transaction.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to deduct as a double value.

    • resetAmountPaid

      public void resetAmountPaid()
      Resets the total amount paid for a transaction to zero.

    • getAmountPaid

      public double getAmountPaid()
      Gets the total amount paid for a transaction.
      Returns:
      the total amount paid as a double value.

    • setAmountPaid

      public void setAmountPaid(double amountPaid)
      Sets the total amount paid for a transaction.
      Parameters:
      amountPaid - the total amount paid as a double value.

    • getMoney

      public Money[] getMoney()
      Gets the array of Money objects representing different denominations of currency.
      Returns:
      the array of Money objects.

    • setMoney

      public void setMoney(Money[] money)
      Sets the array of Money objects representing different denominations of currency.
      Parameters:
      money - the new array of Money objects.

    • getTotalSales

      public double getTotalSales()
      Gets the total sales amount from all successful transactions.
      Returns:
      the total sales amount as a double value.

    • setTotalSales

      public void setTotalSales(double totalSales)
      Sets the total sales amount from all successful transactions.
      Parameters:
      totalSales - the total sales amount as a double value.

    • resetTotalSales

      public void resetTotalSales()
      Resets the total sales amount to zero.

    • getDeletedItems

      public ArrayList<Item> getDeletedItems()
      Gets the list of items that have been deleted (quantity = 0) from the cash box.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Item objects representing the deleted items.

    • setDeletedItems

      public void setDeletedItems(ArrayList<Item> deletedItems)
      Sets the list of items that have been deleted (quantity = 0) from the cash box.
      Parameters:
      deletedItems - the ArrayList of Item objects representing the deleted items.

    • dispenseChange

      public boolean dispenseChange(double change)
      Dispenses change for a transaction by updating the quantity of money denominations used. Returns true if change can be dispensed successfully, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      change - the change amount to dispense as a double value.
      Returns:
      true if change is successfully dispensed, false otherwise.

    • receivePayment

      public boolean receivePayment(ArrayList<Item> items, String itemName, double amountPaid)
      Handles the payment received for an item and updates the cash box accordingly. Returns true if the payment is successful, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      items - the ArrayList of Item objects representing the items available in the vending machine.
      itemName - the name of the item to be purchased.
      amountPaid - the amount paid by the customer as a double value.
      Returns:
      true if the payment is successful, false otherwise.

    • isEmpty

      public void isEmpty(ArrayList<Item> items, String itemName)
      Checks if an item is empty (quantity = 0) and adds it to the deletedItems list if so.
      Parameters:
      items - the ArrayList of Item objects representing the items available in the vending machine.
      itemName - the name of the item to check.

    • getItemByName

      public Item getItemByName(ArrayList<Item> items, String itemName)
      Retrieves an Item object from the ArrayList of items based on the item name.
      Parameters:
      items - the ArrayList of Item objects representing the items available in the vending machine.
      itemName - the name of the item to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Item object representing the desired item or null if not found.

    • getDenominationsSpent

      public ArrayList<Double> getDenominationsSpent()
      Gets the list of money denominations spent for dispensing change during a transaction.
      Returns:
      the ArrayList of Double values representing the money denominations spent.

    • setDenominationsSpent

      public void setDenominationsSpent(ArrayList<Double> denominationsSpent)
      Sets the list of money denominations spent for dispensing change during a transaction.
      Parameters:
      denominationsSpent - the ArrayList of Double values representing the money denominations spent.
